topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540d4a766368725901a50000#post_540d4a766368725901a50000
You know, during the Warring States period in Ancient China when many feudal states were duking out on each other over the control of the land. Amidst the chaos and war, it was a period in China where scholars were able to think freely under a De-centralized rule of the land. That all ended when China was united under Qin, the first Imperial Dynasty.

topics.body: you know, guys, I've thought about how interesting but unique it would be to have a singles board here in the forums, of course, I could be wrong about one not existing, and it could just be me rambling because I've felt lonely since I haven't been with someone in forever and that I always worry I'm gonna die alone without anything worthwhile or even a family and such.

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540d544363687263fd440000#post_540d544363687263fd440000

True, though I guess the idea of having a family of my own is a pipe dream since, being autistic, people do not realize I sometimes wanna feel like I belong, even if they would not suspect I have autism because the symptoms vary from person to person.

Still, thanks for the kind words, Dawn

topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540d55a0636872435e4b0100#post_540d55a0636872435e4b0100
Happy to help.
I've been a loner for quite awhile in my life, I have yet to search for people to develop relationship with. I'm certain I'll find some in the future. And I'm pretty sure you'll find people who do care about you as well. But I've grown used to being lonely. I don't like large gatherings that much myself, lone times are something I value.

topics.body: "@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540da51763687275bf660100#post_540da51763687275bf660100

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540da7bd6368722aa2030200#post_540da7bd6368722aa2030200
With none of that radiation or the Cazadors or even the Deathclaws. *shudders*

That being said, imagine a hybrid of a Cazador and a Deathclaw. Like a Cazadeathclaw.

That also being said, Cazadors are based on the Tarantula hawk wasp
!http://www.bugman123.com/Bugs/TarantulaHawk.jpg!
Their sting is second to the aptly named Bullet Ant and yes, these fuckers eat tarantulas. They even lay and egg on the Spider and the larva spend the few weeks munching on the spider's vital organs while it's still alive.

Which dumb hippie said that nature is beautiful? Jeffrey Dahmer ain't got shit on them and these guys do it like it's a fucking workday.

topics.body:
"Daily science news":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rc3Ss30z1Os
Basically scientists have artificially created protocells.  Basically there's a lot about human biology that we have yet to understand and basically what these protocells accomplish is letting us better understand how cells work together and shit so that we can reverse engineer it biologically synthetically.

Why this is important?  Okay; let's jump fifty years from now; imagine synthetic people, synthetic brains and such.  Like if a chainsaw just hacks off half of your brain and half your body they could just print out a new part of your brain and print out your new body parts.  Also this is massively important in blending man and machine to the point there will be no distinction between android/synthetic or organic; for all intents and purposes it would be human.

Tl:dr; we're starting to understand how cells work and this has massive impacts towards future research in a lot of things and potentially can change a lot of things.
